archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Configure Work Catalog
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process configures the specification of Work and Work Order, including description, relationships, and rules.

properties.value: â€¢{T}Classifying different types of manual activities (or Work Items), including association with required skill sets and job code descriptions â€¢{T}Managing work order specifications and their dependent work items â€¢{T}Establishing the conditions for work items to be instantiated while decomposing work orders â€¢{T}Managing standard durations of work items to be performed, depending on a variety of parameters
